trans-unit.source: Provides data for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"></xref> event that is raised when you click on a selected control or a designer region in a selected control.
trans-unit.target: Gir data for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"> </xref> hendelsen oppstår når du klikker på en kontroll eller en designer region i en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>denne hendelsen oppstår ved designer verten for visse handlinger på en kontroll i utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: For example, an event is raised when you click a selected control or a designer region in a selected control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel oppstår en hendelse når du klikker en kontroll eller et designer område i en kontroll på utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>klassen gir standard representant til å håndtere den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: When you click a selected control or a designer region of a selected control at design time, the designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event type, and then sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property with a DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs object.
trans-unit.target: Når du klikker en kontroll eller en designer området for en kontroll på utformingstidspunktet, designer verten initialiserer en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>objekt en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>hendelsestype, og deretter angir du <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>egenskap med et DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs-objekt.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates that you clicked a designer region, the default delegate in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class passes the DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>objektet indikerer at du klikket en designer område standard representanten i den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>klassen sender DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs-objektet som den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method to process events that are raised when you click a control in the design host.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>klasse overstyring av <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>metode for å behandle hendelser som aktiveres når du klikker en kontroll i utformingen verten.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region%2A> property represents the control designer region that the event applies to, if any.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region%2A>egenskapen representerer kontrollen designer område som hendelsen gjelder, eventuell.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location%2A> property represents the location on the design surface that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location%2A>egenskapen representerer plassering på utformingsoverflaten som ble klikket.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about events and delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelser og representanter [NIB: hendelser og representanter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified region and location.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs"> </xref> klassen med det angitte området og plassering.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> delegate method uses the DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs constructor to initialize a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object for use with a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs konstruktøren representanten brukes til å initialisere en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs>objekt for bruk med en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: When you click a control region at design time, the designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event type, and then sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property with a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Når du velger et område for kontroll på utformingstidspunktet, designer verten initialiserer en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>objekt en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>hendelsestype, og deretter angir du <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>egenskap med en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The designer region that was clicked; used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region*>.
trans-unit.target: Spørringsutformer området som ble klikket; brukes til å starte <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region*>

trans-unit.source: The location that was clicked, relative to the upper left corner of the region; used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location*>.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen som ble klikket i forhold til det øvre venstre hjørnet i området; brukes til å starte <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the location within the control that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Henter plassering i kontrollen ble klikket.

trans-unit.source: The Location property contains the coordinates that identify where you clicked, relative to the upper left corner of the region.
trans-unit.target: Location-egenskapen inneholder koordinatene som identifiserer der du klikket, i forhold til det øvre venstre hjørnet i området.

trans-unit.source: The Location property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Location-egenskapen er initialisert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> identifying the location within the region that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> identifiserer plasseringen i område ble klikket.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer region that was clicked, if any.
trans-unit.target: Henter designer området som ble klikket eventuell.

trans-unit.source: The Region property represents the control designer region that was clicked, if any.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen område representerer kontrollen designer området som ble klikket eventuell.

trans-unit.source: The Region property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen område er initialisert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> that the click event applies to, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no region was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"> </xref> som click-hendelsen gjelder, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis ikke noe område ble klikket.
